meta.property: One Hundred Sixteenth Congress of the United States of America
To reauthorize the Bulletproof Vest Partnership Grant Program.

main.name: HR2379

content.p: To reauthorize the Bulletproof Vest Partnership Grant Program.

main.enactingFormula: Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the United States of America in Congress assembled,

section.heading: Bulletproof Vest Partnership Grant Program reauthorization.

subsection.heading: In general.—
subsection.content: Section 1001(a)(23) of title I of the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 (34 U.S.C. 10261(a)(23)) is amended by striking “part Y” and all that follows and inserting “part Y, $30,000,000 for fiscal year 2020, and each fiscal year thereafter.”.

subsection.heading: Program name.—
subsection.content:
Part Y of title I of the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 (34 U.S.C. 10531 et seq.) is amended by inserting before section 2501 the following:
“Sec. 2500. Patrick Leahy Bulletproof Vest Partnership Grant Program.The program under this part shall be known as the ‘Patrick Leahy Bulletproof Vest Partnership Grant Program’.”.

signature.role: Speaker of the House of Representatives.
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate.
